name: safirial-icons
description: SVG icon asset package compatible with Angular, React, Vue, and vanilla JavaScript/TypeScript projects. Designed for catarina (https://jpcn-portfolio.vercel.app/catarina-preview). This package uses free svg online resources from heroicons(https://heroicons.com/outline) and svg repo(https://www.svgrepo.com/).
author: Juan Pablo CaÃ±on N. (Hydenaky)

scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist/assets && cp -r assets/* dist/assets/ 2>/dev/null || xcopy /E /I assets dist\assets 2>nul || true
